title: Ashe/Garen loot chest not awarded?
body: I didn't get the chest with a random skin +ashe/garen shards,, I found another post on here but I noticed someone posted on it 8 days ago and didn't receive a response so I assume it's been buried, And I'm just gonna remake a post for it I hope that's okay.

replies.body: i have the same problem too i reached lvl 6 and i didn't get garen or ashe i really need the for the reroll. pls help me

Typically you're supposed to get that chest around level 5, but for some reason, the system didn't realize you had ever gotten to that point. Go ahead and double check your account, and that chest should be making it's way to you shortly!
Thanks a lot. I really appreciate it.
